subject: Thank you for your order
body:
[ ![](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/assets/common/dtrpg-logo-small.png) ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com)        **[Account](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/account/settings) | [My Library](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/mylibrary)**       [ ![Facebook](https://drivethrurpg.com/shared_images/icon_facebook_36.png) ](https://www.facebook.com/DriveThruRPG)   [ ![Twitter](https://drivethrurpg.com/shared_images/icon_twitter_36.png) ](https://twitter.com/DriveThruRPG)                   [ **Hottest** ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/browse?sortBy=titleStripBestselling&partial=true&excludeGiftCerts=true)   [ **Newest** ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/browse?sortBy=newest&filterIdsNot=4487&filterIdsNot=2890&filterIdsNot=44287&priceAbove=0&partial=true&pwywSkip=true)   [ **Print** ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/browse?format=44294)   [ **Hot Sales** ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/salesguide)   [ **Free!** ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/browse?priceMin=0&priceMax=0)       Thank you for your purchase! 
=============================
You can always locate your purchased titles in My Library.
Dear Collin Barker,
===================
Thank you for shopping at DriveThruRPG.com!
*Order will be shipped to:*
Collin Barker 
2979 Orion Crescent 
 
Windsor, ON N9E 2Z3
Your Order
==========

===========

Your Order Number is [46714716](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/account/orders/46714716) [Contact Us](https://legacy.drivethrurpg.com/contact_us.php)

Email Money Transfer (Interac e-Transfer)
Login to online or mobile banking at a participating financial institution.
1. Choose Interac e-Transfer within the Transfer/Payment menu options.
2. Select or add a recipient by entering our email address: service@torontogoldbullion.com

Your bank may have a limit on the amount you are allowed to transfer per day. If you reach the limit, you can send the remaining balance the following day(s). The first EMT must be received immediately.

subject: Thank you for your order! (#HJ2210825)
body:
Thank you for your order!
Juniper
Creates
Order
#HJ2210825
-------------------------
Thank you for your order!
-------------------------
Hi Collin, were Juniper Creates! We make custom merchandise for
your favourite creators. Were
excited to send you your order very soon!
What to expect next:
* Youll see a charge on your account from SP JUNIPER CREATES for
$64.29
* Pre-order items will ship at the time indicated on the product
page where you ordered. In stock items will ship in 1  3
business days
* Well send you an update once your order has shipped. Please
note that orders with multiple items often ship
separately
* Once your order has shipped, you can track it by inputting your
order number (#HJ2210825) into our tracking link 
( https://junipercreates.com/docs/contact )
If you have any questions, please reach out to us via our
Contact Form ( https://junipercreates.com/docs/contact )!
View your order 
( https://junipersales.myshopify.com/17966745/orders/e66ffb5cf4a637c14a2f1ba84030404d/authenticate?key=38747af2c1027c8b6151bd0a402821e1&syclid=d948dece-6966-4ebe-824a-c9d939b93f35 )
Thank you for
your patience as we do our best to get your
order to you as quickly and safely as possible.

subject: Order 238580 confirmed
body:
96
/* What it does: Remove spaces around the email design
added by some email clients. */
/* Beware: It can remove the padding / Margin and add a
background color to the compose a reply window. */
html, body 
/* What it does: Stops email clients resizing small
text. */
* 
/* What it does: Forces Outlook.com to display emails
full width. */
.ExternalClass 
/* What is does: Centers email on Android 4.4 */
div[style*="Margin: 16px 0"] 
/* What it does: Stops Outlook from adding extra
spacing to tables. */
table,
th 
/* What it does: Fixes Outlook.com line height. */
.ExternalClass,
.ExternalClass * 
/* What it does: Fixes webkit padding issue. Fix for
Yahoo mail table alignment bug. Applies table-layout to the first
2 tables then removes for anything nested deeper. */
table 
div[style*="Margin: 16px 0"] 
/* What it does: Uses a better rendering method when
resizing images in IE. */
img 
/* What it does: Overrides styles added when Yahoo's
auto-senses a link. */
.yshortcuts a 
/* What it does: Overrides blue, underlined link
auto-detected by iOS Mail. */
/* Create a class for every link style needed; this
template needs only one for the link in the footer. */
/* What it does: A work-around for email clients
meddling in triggered links. */
*[x-apple-data-detectors],  /* iOS */
.x-gmail-data-detectors,    /* Gmail */
.x-gmail-data-detectors *,
.aBn 
/* What it does: Overrides blue, underlined link
auto-detected by Gmail. */
u   #body a 
/* What it does: Prevents Gmail from displaying an
download button on large, non-linked images. */
.a6S 
/* If the above doesn't work, add a .g-img class to any
image in question. */
img.g-img   div 
/* What it does: Prevents underlining the button text
in Windows 10 */
a,
a:link,
a:visited 
.header a 
.main a 
.main .section.customer_and_shipping_address a,
.main .section.shipping_address_and_fulfillment_details
a 
.footer a 
/* What it does: Overrides styles added images. */
img 
td.menu_bar_1 a:hover,
td.menu_bar_6 a:hover 
th.related_product_wrapper.first 
th.related_product_wrapper.last 
a 
li 
/* What it does: Fixes fonts for Google WebFonts; */
[style*="Nunito"] 
[style*="Nunito"] 
[style*="Nunito"] 
[style*="Nunito"] 
*
/* Media Queries */
/* What it does: Removes right gutter in Gmail iOS
app */
@media only screen and (min-device-width: 375px) and
(max-device-width: 413px) 
/* Main media query for responsive styles */
@media only screen and (max-width:480px) 
/* Custom Media Queries */
@media only screen and (max-width:480px)
